issue.title: [C++][Parquet][Doc] default output option for Parquet Scan Example
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14275](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14275). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[Parquet scan example](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/examples/arrow/dataset_parquet_scan_example.cc)  should not fake success if no argument is given, but should instead create a new directory in the current directory.
